Name: Aumadi Technologies
Comment: Customers in India are only put off by the limited options for payment gateways available on Webflow Ecommerce. There needs to be an integration available with Razorpay/PayU/Paytm

Name: Kasseyy Sk
Comment: Adding square as an option to take payments would allow users to use vidmate  square instead of stripe or paypal.

Name: Nikhil More
Comment: Yes please! Webflow and shopify are priced neck to neck but webflow doesnt have the support in terms of payment gateway integration in India. This needs priority.
